name: Hentai Sea Battle
description:
Hentai Sea Battle - Classic sea battle. Destroy all enemy ships faster than he can destroy yours to win the battle.

Features:
  • 10 levels
  • 2 game modes: Player vs. Player and Player vs. AI
  • Original soundtrack
  • Steam Achievements
Control: LMB hold and drag - place the ship. RMB - turn the ship 90 degrees. F - hide/show clothes.
Credits: The game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Erwarda Savitnaag.
